title: Looking for a piece of fan art that I can't find..
content:
I'm looking for a piece of fan art I'd like to see again. I can't find it anywhere. But I'm pretty sure it's real and I haven't just made that up in some dream. Anyways, it's kinda cool picture; it has a head that has a helmet on, but the left side of the face and helmet is Mortimer and the right side is Keen. If I remember correct the paint style was rather dark and lines were fuzzy. It probably had space background, can't be sure.
If anyone knows where to find it, do link me up.[url=http://www.keengrid.net/]keengrid.net[/url]

title: Re: Looking for a piece of fan art that I can't find..
content:
Google and Altavista didn't help, but I think it's probably on 3D Realms' website, in the fanart section.
After I realised that and used Google to only look there I still couldn't find it, so I could be wrong.
I know the image you're talking about though!

(I'm at work, so a lot of sites are blocked here, meaning I have to use Google's cache and the like.)Retodon8
You live, you die, you are remembered, you are forgotten. [url=http://keen.retodon8.net/][img]http://retodon8.net/Graphics/Keen_Yorp.gif[/img][/url]

title: Re: Looking for a piece of fan art that I can't find..
content: I might be wrong, but didn't TMST do one like that?[url=http://www.screenhog.com]www.screenhog.com[/url]

title: Re: Looking for a piece of fan art that I can't find..
content:
Now when you mention it, probably there's that kind of pic in some of his comics or in that Keen 10 Years On, but that's not what I'm looking for -- this one is not made by TMST but I just can't remember the author who did this.
Hopefully you can find it later Ret. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] [url=http://www.keengrid.net/]keengrid.net[/url]

title: Re: Looking for a piece of fan art that I can't find..
content:
Well, it's not on [url=http://www.3drealms.com/fanstuff/]3D Realms' fan stuff page[/url] after all.
(Even at home, where nothing is blocked, I had to spend some time to find that page again.)

I can't promise I'll dedicate all my free time to it, but if I find it again, I'll go ahead and tell you.
(I'm pretty sure it wasn't from the 10 Years On project, I recall seeing it on some site fairly recently.)Retodon8
You live, you die, you are remembered, you are forgotten. [url=http://keen.retodon8.net/][img]http://retodon8.net/Graphics/Keen_Yorp.gif[/img][/url]

title: Re: Looking for a piece of fan art that I can't find..
content:
I did a picture like that a while ago. Although I didn't think I submitted it anywhere. I don't even know if I scanned it. I haven't seen anything like that, other than on TMST's page.-----------------------
"The Adventures of Commander Keen" issue #1: [img]http://img170.imageshack.us/img170/5541/newteaserdarker1xh.png[/img]
"Fat people buy lots"

title: Re: Looking for a piece of fan art that I can't find..
content: [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]  But there exist one, since both Ret and I know about it.. Gaaarg, I want to find it![url=http://www.keengrid.net/]keengrid.net[/url]

title: Re: Looking for a piece of fan art that I can't find..
content:
Yes, yes, I have seen the picture you seek also. But where is it now? Collecting dust on a spare hard drive? Being admired as a piece of neo-constructionist art? We may never know.A proud member of the signature stealing society

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/Kazz.gif[/img]

"No one should be here."
-Levellord
